name: Defiance (Season 1)
summary: 当沃坦星毁灭之后，由七个种族组成的沃坦人来到地球寻求帮助，希望能在这里安家。地球政府与沃坦人展开了大约六年的谈判，最终拒绝了他们的要求。沃坦人不愿离去，战争随即爆发。战争持续了九年，交战的双方都无法消灭对方，只好坐下来谈判。地球已经变成了一颗与当初完全不同的行星，只有搁置争议、共同开发才能让双方都生存下去。外星人重新构建了地球的表面，人类和外星人不得不和平共存。Jeb（格兰特·鲍尔 Grant Bowler 饰）是新兴都市的执法官，战争让他失去了妻子和孩子，导致他性格孤僻。收养了人类与外星种族伊拉西恩特人混血Irisa（斯蒂芬妮·列尼达斯 Stephanie Leonidas 饰）将她培养成自己的得力助手。市长（朱莉·本茨 Julie Benz 饰）是个典型的理想主义者，希望用政治手段来维持社会的和平与稳定。然而，一部分势力试图在这里建立新的社会秩序。

eps.name: Pilot
eps.desc: Nolan and Irisa are Arkfall scavengers who travel through the world of 2046. Earth has been terraformed by an alien invasion fleet which was then forced to settle on Earth. Nolan and Irisa make their way to the town of Defiance and soon become involved with a feud between the two leading families, a feud that ends in murder.

eps.name: Down in the Ground Where the Dead Men Go
eps.desc: While Irisa takes offense at a Castithan ritual that involves the torture of an offender, Nolan and Rafe take an expedition into Old St. Louis to find the traitor Ben, who has escaped imprisonment and plans to complete his plan to destroy Defiance.

eps.name: The Devil in the Dark
eps.desc: Two Defiance residents die, torn apart, and Nolan soon discovers that someone is using mutant Hellbugs as murder weapons to get revenge for a past crime. Meanwhile, Irisa suffers from visions that may lead them to the killer.

eps.name: A Well Respected Man
eps.desc: Kenya is abducted by a bio-man who is part of a drug-manufacturing ring. Nolan and Amanda turn to Datak for help, but realize that he wants a heavy price in return for his assistance. Meanwhile, Rafe and Quentin try to determine what Luke was up to that cost him his life.

eps.name: The Serpent's Egg
eps.desc: While Nolan and Amanda make a danger-filled journey to pay for the new maglev spur, Irisa captures a Castithan who she believes tortured her as a child and tries to force him to confess.
